channel.title: CFA Level 1 on Free Analyst Notes
channel.description: Recent content in CFA Level 1 on Free Analyst Notes

item.title: CFA Level 1 - Economics
item.description: The CFA level 1 exam covers economics in great detail, specifically, macroeconomics. It covers demand and supply, market structures, and more.

item.title: CFA Level 1 Equities
item.description: Equities Types of Orders Financing Underwriting Markets Efficient Market Hypothesis Abnormal rate of return Tests for Market Efficiency Tests for independence Return prediction studies Strong-form Efficiency Market Anamolies (public information - tests for Semi-strong EMH) Reasons Why Markets Should be Efficient EMH Conclusions Role of Portfolio Managers (in a perfectly efficient market) Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) Issuing ETFs The CFA Level 1 exam covers the topic of Equities which includes market orders, indexes, market structure, and more.

item.title: CFA Level 1: Alternative Investments
item.description: Alternative investments is a growing field full of potential profit opportunities. Learn about the basics here.
